TrueFactEnglish: 1,000,000,000,000,000 (that’s one quadrillion) ants live on Earth.
TrueFactMandarin: 地球上总共有大约十亿只蚂蚁。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 地球上总共有大约一百万亿只蚂蚁。
FalseFactEnglish: About 1,000,000,000 ants live on Earth.
FalseFactMandarin: 地球上总共有大约一百万亿只蚂蚁。

TrueFactEnglish: 650 houseflies weigh less than one ounce.
TrueFactMandarin: 将650只苍蝇凑合起来，重量仍未达1盎司。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 将650只苍蝇凑合起来，总重量可超过一颗橙。
FalseFactEnglish: 650 houseflies weigh more than an orange.
FalseFactMandarin: 将650只苍蝇凑合起来，总重量可超过一颗橙。

TrueFactEnglish: 75% of all animals are insects.
TrueFactMandarin: 百分之75的动物是昆虫。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 百分之13的动物是昆虫。
FalseFactEnglish: 13% of all animals are insects.
FalseFactMandarin: 百分之13的动物是昆虫。

TrueFactEnglish: A caterpillar has more muscles than a human.
TrueFactMandarin: 毛毛虫的肌肉比人类的肌肉还要多。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 人类比毛毛虫多出36块肌肉。
FalseFactEnglish: A human has 36 more muscles than a caterpillar
FalseFactMandarin: 人类比毛毛虫多出36块肌肉。

TrueFactEnglish: A cockroach can live for weeks without a head.
TrueFactMandarin: 没有头的蟑螂还能存活几个星期。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 没有头的蟑螂无法存活超过五个小时。
FalseFactEnglish: A cockroach can't live longer than 5 hours without a head.
FalseFactMandarin: 没有头的蟑螂无法存活超过五个小时。

TrueFactEnglish: A decapitated cockroach head can still wiggle its antennae.
TrueFactMandarin: 蟑螂头即使脱离身体，仍然可以摆动触角。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蟑螂头即使脱离身体，仍然可以摆动后肢。
FalseFactEnglish: A decapitated cockroach head can still wiggle its feet.
FalseFactMandarin: 蟑螂头即使脱离身体，仍然可以摆动后肢。

TrueFactEnglish: A flea can jump hundred times its body length—that’s like you jumping to the top of a 34-story building.
TrueFactMandarin: 跳蚤可以跳跃高达其身长的一百倍，就像我们一跃跳上一座34层楼高的建筑物顶楼。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 跳蚤跳跃的高度只能是其身长的两倍。
FalseFactEnglish: A flea can only jump twice it's body length
FalseFactMandarin: 跳蚤跳跃的高度只能是其身长的两倍。

TrueFactEnglish: A flea can jump more than 130 times its height.
TrueFactMandarin: 跳蚤能跳到高出身长130倍的高度。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 跳蚤能跳到高出身长23倍的高度。
FalseFactEnglish: A flea can jump almost 23 times its height.
FalseFactMandarin: 跳蚤能跳到高出身长23倍的高度。

TrueFactEnglish: A queen bee can lay 2,000 eggs a day in the spring.
TrueFactMandarin: 春天来临时, 蜂后每天可产出2000颗蜂卵。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 春天来临时,蚁王每天可产出2000颗蜂卵。
FalseFactEnglish: A Prince Ant can lay 2,000 eggs a day in the spring.
FalseFactMandarin: 春天来临时, 蚁王每天可产出2000颗蜂卵。

TrueFactEnglish: A spiderweb in Texas stretches some 600 feet, almost as long as 2 football fields.
TrueFactMandarin: 人们在美国德克萨斯州发现一个183米宽的蜘蛛网，面积相等于两个足球场。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 人们在美国密歇根州发现一个60米宽的蜘蛛网。
FalseFactEnglish: A spiderweb in Michigan stretches some 200 feet wide.
FalseFactMandarin: 人们在美国密歇根州发现一个60米宽的蜘蛛网。

TrueFactEnglish: A tropical ant can snap its jaws together at a speed of 145 miles an hour, faster than any other animal!
TrueFactMandarin: 热带蚁能以每小时233公里的速度合上上下颚，比任何动物都快！
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 鳄龟合上上下颚的速度比热带蚁还要快。
FalseFactEnglish: A snapping turtle can snap it's jaws together faster than a tropical ant.
FalseFactMandarin: 鳄龟合上上下颚的速度比热带蚁还要快。

TrueFactEnglish: An ant can carry 50 times its body weight (that’s like a kid carrying a car).
TrueFactMandarin: 蚂蚁可以抬起比自身体重多50倍的重物，相等于一个小朋友抬起一辆汽车。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蚂蚁只能抬起比自身体重多两倍的物体。
FalseFactEnglish: An Ant can carry twice it's body weight.
FalseFactMandarin: 蚂蚁只能抬起比自身体重多两倍的物体。

TrueFactEnglish: Ants have lived on Earth for some 140 million years.
TrueFactMandarin: 蚂蚁在地球上生活了大约1亿4千年。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蚂蚁在地球上生活了大约八千万年。
FalseFactEnglish: Ants have lived on Earth for almost 80 million years.
FalseFactMandarin: 蚂蚁在地球上生活了大约八千万年。

TrueFactEnglish: Ants have two stomachs.
TrueFactMandarin: 蚂蚁有两个胃。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蚂蚁没有胃。
FalseFactEnglish: Ants don't have stomachs.
FalseFactMandarin: 蚂蚁没有胃。

TrueFactEnglish: As many as 50,000 beetles can feed on one pile of elephant dung.
TrueFactMandarin: 每坨大象粪便可喂饱5万只甲虫。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 每坨大象粪便可喂饱4600只甲虫。
FalseFactEnglish: Almost as many as 4,600 beetles can feed on one pile of elephant dung.
FalseFactMandarin: 每坨大象粪便可喂饱4600只甲虫。

TrueFactEnglish: Bees can be green, blue, or red.
TrueFactMandarin: 世界上有青色、蓝色和红色的蜜蜂。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 世界上所有的蜜蜂都是黄色和黑色的。
FalseFactEnglish: All bees are yellow and black
FalseFactMandarin: 世界上所有的蜜蜂都是黄色和黑色的。

TrueFactEnglish: Bees have 5 eyes.
TrueFactMandarin: 蜜蜂有5只眼睛。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜜蜂有一双眼睛。
FalseFactEnglish: Bees have 2 eyes.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜜蜂有一双眼睛。

TrueFactEnglish: Bees visit about five million flowers to make one average-size jar of honey.
TrueFactMandarin: 蜜蜂需要采集500万朵花的花蜜，才能凑成一瓶蜂蜜。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜜蜂只要采集到1000朵花的花蜜，就能凑成一瓶蜂蜜。
FalseFactEnglish: Bees visit 1 thousand flowers to make one jar of honey.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜜蜂只要采集到1000朵花的花蜜，就能凑成一瓶蜂蜜。

TrueFactEnglish: Butterflies must warm their wings in the sun before flying.
TrueFactMandarin: 蝴蝶起飞前，会张开翅膀在阳光下“暖翼”。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蝴蝶起飞前，必须确保翅膀已经冷却下来。
FalseFactEnglish: Butterflies can't fly unless their wings are cold first.
FalseFactMandarin: 蝴蝶起飞前，必须确保翅膀已经冷却下来。

TrueFactEnglish: Butterflies taste food with their feet.
TrueFactMandarin: 蝴蝶用脚来品尝食物。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蝴蝶用舌头来品尝食物，就跟人类一样。
FalseFactEnglish: Butterflies taste food with their tongues, like humans.
FalseFactMandarin: 蝴蝶用舌头来品尝食物，就跟人类一样。

TrueFactEnglish: Caterpillars have about 3,200 more muscles than you do.
TrueFactMandarin: 毛毛虫比人类多出3200块肌肉。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 毛毛虫身上的肌肉比人类少。
FalseFactEnglish: Caterpillars have less muscles than a human.
FalseFactMandarin: 毛毛虫身上的肌肉比人类少。

TrueFactEnglish: Caterpillars have mouths, but butterflies don’t.
TrueFactMandarin: 毛毛虫有嘴巴，但蝴蝶没有。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 毛毛虫有嘴巴，但蝴蝶没有。
FalseFactEnglish: Butterflies have mouths.
FalseFactMandarin: 毛毛虫有嘴巴，但蝴蝶没有。

TrueFactEnglish: Cockroaches can recognize family members.
TrueFactMandarin: 蟑螂可以认出自己的家人。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蟑螂无法认出自己人。
FalseFactEnglish: Cockroaches can't tell each other apart.
FalseFactMandarin: 蟑螂无法认出自己人。

TrueFactEnglish: Crickets detect sound through their knees.
TrueFactMandarin: 蟋蟀通过膝盖探测声音。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蟋蟀通过耳朵探测声音，就跟人类一样。
FalseFactEnglish: Crickets detect sound through their ears, like humans.
FalseFactMandarin: 蟋蟀通过耳朵探测声音，就跟人类一样。

TrueFactEnglish: Dragonflies can see in all directions.
TrueFactMandarin: 蜻蜓拥有360度的视野。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜻蜓只能看见眼前的景象。
FalseFactEnglish: Dragonflies can only see in front of themselves.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜻蜓只能看见眼前的景象。

TrueFactEnglish: Earthworms have five hearts.
TrueFactMandarin: 蚯蚓有5个心脏。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蚯蚓没有心脏。
FalseFactEnglish: Earthworms don't have hearts.
FalseFactMandarin: 蚯蚓没有心脏。

TrueFactEnglish: For defense, many tarantulas kick their hair at foes.
TrueFactMandarin: 狼蛛面对敌人时，会射出毛发抵御。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 狼蛛会发出嘶嘶声咒骂敌人。
FalseFactEnglish: For defense, many tarantulas whisper spells at foes.
FalseFactMandarin: 狼蛛会发出嘶嘶声咒骂敌人。

TrueFactEnglish: Fungus can grow out of a zombie ant’s head.
TrueFactMandarin: 真菌可以在僵尸蚁的头上生长。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 僵尸蚁的头上能长出香口胶。
FalseFactEnglish: Chewing gum can grow out of a zombie ant’s head.
FalseFactMandarin: 僵尸蚁的头上能长出香口胶。

TrueFactEnglish: Ghost ants have see-through stomachs.
TrueFactMandarin: 黑头慌蚁的腹部是呈现半透明的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 黑头慌蚁没有前后肢。
FalseFactEnglish: Ghost ants don't have arms or legs.
FalseFactMandarin: 黑头慌蚁没有前后肢。

TrueFactEnglish: Honeybees can be trained to detect explosives.
TrueFactMandarin: 蜜蜂可被训练成搜爆专家。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜜蜂无法被训练成才。
FalseFactEnglish: Honeybees can't be trained.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜜蜂无法被训练成才。

TrueFactEnglish: Houseflies buzz in the key of F.
TrueFactMandarin: 苍蝇的嗡嗡声是F调的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 苍蝇是不会发出声音的。
FalseFactEnglish: Houseflies are completely silent.
FalseFactMandarin: 苍蝇是不会发出声音的。

TrueFactEnglish: If grasshoppers were the size of people, they could leap the length of a basketball court.
TrueFactMandarin: 如果蚱蜢跟人一样大，就可以跳过一个篮球场。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 如果蚱蜢长得跟人类一样大小，每跳一次，距离是3.5米。
FalseFactEnglish: If grasshoppers were the size of people, they could leap the length of 3.5 meters.
FalseFactMandarin: 如果蚱蜢长得跟人类一样大小，每跳一次，距离是3.5米。

TrueFactEnglish: Ladybugs might play dead when threatened.
TrueFactMandarin: 瓢虫受到威胁时会装死。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 瓢虫受到威胁时会倒立。
FalseFactEnglish: Ladybugs might do hand stands when threatened.
FalseFactMandarin: 瓢虫受到威胁时会倒立。

TrueFactEnglish: Ladybugs squirt smelly liquid from their knees when they get scared.
TrueFactMandarin: 瓢虫受惊时，会从膝盖喷出难闻的液体。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 雌蜂受惊时，会从膝盖喷出难闻的液体。
FalseFactEnglish: Female bees squirt smelly liquid from their knees when they get scared.
FalseFactMandarin: 雌蜂受惊时，会从膝盖喷出难闻的液体。

TrueFactEnglish: Love-struck mosquitoes harmonize their buzzing sounds.
TrueFactMandarin: 恋爱中的蚊子会发出嗡嗡响的共鸣声。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蚊子不懂得谈恋爱。
FalseFactEnglish: Mosquitoes don't fall in love.
FalseFactMandarin: 蚊子不懂得谈恋爱。

TrueFactEnglish: Many ancient physicians used spiderwebs as bandages.
TrueFactMandarin: 古时候有许多医师使用蜘蛛网作为绷带。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 古时候有许多医师使用象耳作为绷带。
FalseFactEnglish: Many ancient physicians used elephant ears as bandages.
FalseFactMandarin: 古时候有许多医师使用象耳作为绷带。

TrueFactEnglish: Most spiders have eight eyes.
TrueFactMandarin: 大部分的蜘蛛有八只眼睛。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 大部分的蜘蛛有三只眼睛。
FalseFactEnglish: Most spiders have 3 eyes.
FalseFactMandarin: 大部分的蜘蛛有三只眼睛。

TrueFactEnglish: Moths can smell each other from miles away.
TrueFactMandarin: 飞蛾可以从几公里外闻到同伴的气味。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 飞蛾没有嗅觉。
FalseFactEnglish: Moths can't smell.
FalseFactMandarin: 飞蛾没有嗅觉。

TrueFactEnglish: Only female bees sting.
TrueFactMandarin: 只有雌蜂才会蜇人。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 只有雄蜂才会蜇人。
FalseFactEnglish: Only the male bees can sting.
FalseFactMandarin: 只有雄蜂才会蜇人。

TrueFactEnglish: Outside, you are rarely more than six feet away from a spider.
TrueFactMandarin: 在户外，我们和蜘蛛之间的距离很少会超过182厘米。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 在户外，我们和蜘蛛之间的距离只有一辆脚踏车的身长。
FalseFactEnglish: Outside, you are rarely more than six feet away from a bicycle.
FalseFactMandarin: 在户外，我们和蜘蛛之间的距离只有一辆脚踏车的身长。

TrueFactEnglish: Slugs have 3,000 teeth and 4 noses.
TrueFactMandarin: 蛞蝓拥有3000颗牙齿和4个鼻子。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蛞蝓拥有1000颗牙齿和两个嘴唇，没有鼻子。
FalseFactEnglish: Slugs have 1,000 teeth, two lips, and no nose.
FalseFactMandarin: 蛞蝓拥有1000颗牙齿和两个嘴唇，没有鼻子。

TrueFactEnglish: Some ants can make themselves explode.
TrueFactMandarin: 有些蚂蚁会“引爆自己”。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 树蜂会“引爆自己”。
FalseFactEnglish: Tree Wasps can make themselves explode.
FalseFactMandarin: 树蜂会“引爆自己”。

TrueFactEnglish: Some beetles glow orange.
TrueFactMandarin: 有些甲虫会发出橙色的光芒。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 甲虫不会发光。
FalseFactEnglish: Unlike worms and flys, Beetles cannot glow.
FalseFactMandarin: 甲虫不会发光。

TrueFactEnglish: Some butterflies' ears are on their wings.
TrueFactMandarin: 有些蝴蝶的耳朵长在翅膀上。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蝴蝶破茧而出时，双眼也随之脱落。
FalseFactEnglish: Butterflies shed their ears after leaving their cocoon.
FalseFactMandarin: 蝴蝶破茧而出时，双眼也随之脱落。

TrueFactEnglish: Some crickets’ chirps can be used to estimate the temperature (number of chirps in 15 seconds + 40 = degrees Fahrenheit).
TrueFactMandarin: 有些蟋蟀发出的唧唧声预测温度；蟋蟀每15秒钟叫的次数加上40，就是华氏温度。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有些蟋蟀可被用来预测建筑物的高度。
FalseFactEnglish: Some crickets’ chirps can be used to estimate how tall a building is.
FalseFactMandarin: 有些蟋蟀可被用来预测建筑物的高度。

TrueFactEnglish: Some experts think individual honeybees have different personalities.
TrueFactMandarin: 有专家认为每只蜜蜂有不同个性。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 每只蜜蜂的个性都一样。
FalseFactEnglish: Honeybees all act the same.
FalseFactMandarin: 每只蜜蜂的个性都一样。

TrueFactEnglish: Some moths drink the tears of elephants.
TrueFactMandarin: 有一种飞蛾靠吸食大象的眼泪为生。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有一种飞蛾会饮用能量饮。
FalseFactEnglish: Some moths drink energy drinks.
FalseFactMandarin: 有一种飞蛾会饮用能量饮。

TrueFactEnglish: Some snails can sleep for three years.
TrueFactMandarin: 有些蜗牛可以三年不起床。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜗牛从来不睡觉。
FalseFactEnglish: Snails are a species that doesn't sleep.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜗牛从来不睡觉。

TrueFactEnglish: Some spiders eat their own webs.
TrueFactMandarin: 有些蜘蛛会把结好的网吃掉。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜘蛛不喜欢蜘蛛网的味道。
FalseFactEnglish: Spiders don't like the taste of their own webs.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜘蛛不喜欢蜘蛛网的味道。

TrueFactEnglish: Some tarantulas are blue.
TrueFactMandarin: 有的狼蛛是蓝色的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 狼蛛都是褐色的，而且是不同层次的褐色。
FalseFactEnglish: Tarantulas are only different shades of brown.
FalseFactMandarin: 狼蛛都是褐色的，而且是不同层次的褐色。

TrueFactEnglish: Some wasps use pebbles as hammers to pound dirt into their nests
TrueFactMandarin: 有黄蜂使用卵石作为锤子，将污垢打入巢穴。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有黄蜂使用后肢作为锤子，将污垢打入巢穴。
FalseFactEnglish: Some wasps use their feet as hammers to pound dirt into their nests
FalseFactMandarin: 有黄蜂使用后肢作为锤子，将污垢打入巢穴。

TrueFactEnglish: Some worms can grow to 100 feet long.
TrueFactMandarin: 有的虫类的身长可达30米。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 身长最长的虫类长达13米。
FalseFactEnglish: The longest worm ever recorded was 43 feet long.
FalseFactMandarin: 身长最长的虫类长达13米。

TrueFactEnglish: Spider silk has been used to make violin strings.
TrueFactMandarin: 蜘蛛丝曾经被用来制造小提琴弦。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜘蛛丝曾经被用来制造车轮。
FalseFactEnglish: Spider Silk has been used to make car tires.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜘蛛丝曾经被用来制造车轮。

TrueFactEnglish: Spider silk is used to make fishing nets in some countries.
TrueFactMandarin: 在某些国家，人们利用蜘蛛丝来制造渔网。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 在某些国家，人们利用蜘蛛丝来制造游戏控制器。
FalseFactEnglish: Spider silk is used to make video game controllers in some countries.
FalseFactMandarin: 在某些国家，人们利用蜘蛛丝来制造游戏控制器。

TrueFactEnglish: Spiders have clear blood.
TrueFactMandarin: 蝙蝠的血液是透明的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蝙蝠的血液是青色的。
FalseFactEnglish: Spiders have green blood..
FalseFactMandarin: 蝙蝠的血液是青色的。

TrueFactEnglish: Tarantulas can live for up to 20 years.
TrueFactMandarin: 狼蛛可以存活20年。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 狼蛛可以存活6年。
FalseFactEnglish: Tarantulas die when they turn 6 years of age.
FalseFactMandarin: 狼蛛可以存活6年。

TrueFactEnglish: The Asian weaver ant can hold objects 100 times its weight—while hanging upside down!
TrueFactMandarin: 亚洲织叶蚁能举起比自身体重重一百倍的物体，即便是在倒转的姿势下。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 亚洲织叶蚁与其他蚁类不同，无法举起任何东西。
FalseFactEnglish: Unlike most ants, the Asian weaver ant can't hold anything.
FalseFactMandarin: 亚洲织叶蚁与其他蚁类不同，无法举起任何东西。

TrueFactEnglish: The bombardier beetle can shoot hot poison from its rear end 500 times a second.
TrueFactMandarin: 射炮步甲的腹部末端可射出炽热的毒液，而且每秒能射出500次。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 射炮步甲的腹部末端可射出炽热的毒液，而且每秒能射出100次。
FalseFactEnglish: The bombardier beetle can shoot hot poison from its rear end 100 times a second.
FalseFactMandarin: 射炮步甲的腹部末端可射出炽热的毒液，而且每秒能射出100次。

TrueFactEnglish: The death’s-head moth has a skull-shaped design on its body.
TrueFactMandarin: 鬼脸天蛾成虫后，背面会呈现一个骷髅形斑纹。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 鬼脸天蛾成虫后，背面会呈现一个香蕉形斑纹。
FalseFactEnglish: The death’s-head moth has a banana design on its body.
FalseFactMandarin: 鬼脸天蛾成虫后，背面会呈现一个香蕉形斑纹。

TrueFactEnglish: The pirate ant has black marks on its head that look like eye patches.
TrueFactMandarin: 海盗蚁的头上有着黑色印记，让人以为是眼睛。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 海盗蚁的头上长着看似宝剑和藏宝箱的黑色印记。
FalseFactEnglish: The pirate ant has black marks on its head that look like swords and treasure.
FalseFactMandarin: 海盗蚁的头上长着看似宝剑和藏宝箱的黑色印记。

TrueFactEnglish: The praying mantis is the only insect that looks over its shoulder.
TrueFactMandarin: 螳螂是唯一能够看到自身肩膀的的昆虫。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 蜣螂是唯一能够看到自身肩膀的的昆虫。
FalseFactEnglish: The Dung Beetle is the only insect that looks over its shoulder.
FalseFactMandarin: 蜣螂是唯一能够看到自身肩膀的的昆虫。

TrueFactEnglish: The world’s lightest mammal—the bumblebee bat—weighs less than a nickel.
TrueFactMandarin: 凹脸蝠是世界上最轻的哺乳动物，它的重量比一枚硬币还要轻。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 浣熊是世界上最轻的哺乳动物。
FalseFactEnglish: The world’s lightest mammal is the Wasp Racoon.
FalseFactMandarin: 浣熊是世界上最轻的哺乳动物。

TrueFactEnglish: The world’s termites outweigh the world’s humans.
TrueFactMandarin: 这个世界上的白蚁数量比人类多。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 在这个世界上，人类的数量比白蚁多。
FalseFactEnglish: The world's humans weigh more than all of the world's termites.
FalseFactMandarin: 在这个世界上，人类的数量比白蚁多。

TrueFactEnglish: There can be about as many insects in one square mile as there are people on the entire planet.
TrueFactMandarin: 地球上每2.6平方公里的土地上所含有的昆虫数量，相等于全世界的人口。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 地球上的人类数量比昆虫来得还要多。
FalseFactEnglish: There are more people on the entire planet than there are insects.
FalseFactMandarin: 地球上的人类数量比昆虫来得还要多。
